item.title: Aggregate Window Functions in Pandas and SQL
item.description: This is not an introduction to window functions in Pandas or SQL. I will just use one example to compare implementing aggregate window function in Pandas and SQL. We can start from the following DataFrame df with 3 groups and some random values: id group value 0 a 1 1 a 2 2 a 3 3 a 4 4 a 5 5 a 6 6 b 1 7 b 2 8 b 3 9 b 4 10 b 5 11 b 6 12 c 1 13 c 2 14 c 3 15 c 4 16 c 5 17 c 6 If I am getting the sum of a 4 rows window with 1 row before current row and 2 row after, this would be my code to perform it in Pandasql:
